name: HarmonyTD
description: Harmony TD is a competitive multiplayer 3D Tower Defense game. You control a builder and you have to defend the city against waves of bad mana minions. Are you ready ?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series or higher DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
